Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the end of Bendine Way, on the north side of Nylandian Bay.
Room.LongDescription: Bendine Way ends here at the beach along the northern coast of the Nylandian Bay. On the east side of the road is a small import shop called Highland Trade Imports. A small dirt road runs along the northern beach between the Bay and a few more shops.
